# Naming sections

```{r load_data}
library("ggplot2")

gapminder <- read.csv("../data/gapminder_data.csv")
```

```{r plot}
ggplot(data=gapminder,
       mapping=aes(x=gdpPercap,y=lifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```
